Feb 25 (Reuters) - Airtel Africa PLC AAF.L:: *AIRTEL AFRICA PLC - TOWER SALES UPDATE *AIRTEL AFRICA - ENTERED INTO MEMORANDUM OF UNDERSTANDING AGREEMENTS FOR POTENTIAL SALE OF ITS TOWER ASSETS IN CHAD AND GABON, TO HELIOS TOWERS PLC *AIRTEL AFRICA - GABON: AIRTEL AFRICA AND HELIOS TOWERS HAVE EXTENDED THEIR MEMORANDUM OF UNDERSTANDING ARRANGEMENT *AIRTEL AFRICA - COMPLETION STILL SUBJECT TO HELIOS TOWERS OBTAINING A PASSIVE INFRASTRUCTURE LICENCE


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 25-FEB-202207:00:07 GMT
